The topic is locked, but this needs to be addressed.
I didn’t say anywhere that the punishment was undeserved; I stated that, given the zero effect that the warning system has on private messages, the moderation was not the best choice because it had no effect on further usage of the PM system (I then went on to state that, had I been the one to deal with the issue, I would have made use of the ban system and a ban from posting/sending PMs for x amount of days).

Please don’t misconstrue what I have to say; it’s not fair on me, or anyone else, when you don’t quote them properly or omit crucial details.
